      public StorageContainer()

  • Method Details

    • addResource

      public boolean addResource​(Resource resource, int slotNum)
      this method tries to insert a given amount of a resource in a specific slot
      Parameters:
      resource - is the resource to insert
      slotNum - is the slot where we try to insert
      Returns:
      is true if the insertion is successful, is false if it was not possible, if it is false nothing has changed

    • addOneResourceByResourceName

      public boolean addOneResourceByResourceName​(java.lang.String resourceType, int slotNumber)

    • removeResource

      public boolean removeResource​(Resource resource)
      this method tries to remove a given amount of a resource
      Parameters:
      resource - is the type and quantity of resource to remove
      Returns:
      is true if it was removed successfully, is false if it was not possible to remove for various reasons, if it is false nothing has changed

    • switchResources

      public boolean switchResources​(int firstSlotNumber, int secondSlotNumber)
      this method tries to switch the resources contained in two slots, the slots allowed are only 1, 2 and 3
      Parameters:
      firstSlotNumber - is the number of one of the two slots
      secondSlotNumber - is the number of the other one of the two slots
      Returns:
      is true if it was successful, is false if it was not possible for any reason, if it is false nothing has changed

    • moveOneResource

      public boolean moveOneResource​(int fromSlotNumber, int toSlotNumber)
      this method tries to move 1 quantity of a resource from a standard slot to a leader slot or vice versa
      Parameters:
      fromSlotNumber - is the clot from which the recource id taken
      toSlotNumber - is the slot where the recource will be placed
      Returns:
      is true if it was successful, is false if it was not possible for any reason, if it is false nothing has changed

    • getResourceQuantity

      public int getResourceQuantity​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      the method returns the total quantity contained of a resource type
      Parameters:
      resourceName - is the type of the resource to count
      Returns:
      is the quantity of the specified resource that is stored on this object

    • getResourceOfSlot

      public Resource getResourceOfSlot​(int slotNumber)
      this method returns a clone of the resource present in a specified slot, this method is intended to be used to update the view of a player watching his storage resources
      Parameters:
      slotNumber - is the slot that is going to be observed
      Returns:
      is the clone of the resource present, is null if no resource is present

    • activateLeaderSlot

      public void activateLeaderSlot​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      this method activates a leader slot
      Parameters:
      resourceName - is the resource type associated to the leader slot

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
